ValidationRule.description: When an opportunity is complex a team member of a certain type must be related to the opportunity.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: Case_Handover_Active__c = true && RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Sales' && ISCHANGED( StageName ) && (ISPICKVAL( StageName, 'Proposal') || ISPICKVAL( StageName, 'Negotiation') || ISPICKVAL( StageName, 'Close Agreement') || ISPICKVAL( StageName, 'Closed Won')) && Complex_Configuration_Network_Setup__c = true && (Team_Member_SalesSpecialist_Count__c < 1 || ISBLANK(Team_Member_SalesSpecialist_Count__c )) && SalesSpecialistNOTneeded__c = false
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This is a Complex opportunity and a Sales Specialist is needed. Please add a Sales Specialist to the Opportunity Team or select Sales Specialist NOT needed.
